short_summary: Contract ID PW-23-01030723 is a maintenance service involving equipment upkeep, upgrades, and support
description: The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (OSFI) has a requirement for the provision and maintenance of its videoconference equipment infrastructure
full_summary:
**Videoconference Maintenance Agreement**
==========================================

**Reference Number:** PW-23-01030723
**Amendment Number:** 3
**Solicitation Number:** 20221312
**Publication Date:** March 23, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** May 9, 2023
**Expected Contract Start Date:** TBA
**Expected Contract End Date:** TBA

**Notice Type:**
OSFI is soliciting proposals from qualified contractors for the provision and maintenance of its videoconference equipment infrastructure, including the upgrade to Poly Clariti 2.0, in four locations across Canada.

**Procurement Details:**

*   Procurement Category: Goods and Services
*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   Notice Type: Request for Proposal
*   Trade Agreements: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Regions of Opportunity: Canada
*   Regions of Delivery: Canada
    *   Ontario (except NCR)
    *   National Capital Region (NCR)
    *   Quebec (except NCR)

**Contracting Entity:**

Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (OSFI)
255 Albert Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0H2

**Contact Information:**

Himani Joshi, Contracting Officer
himani.joshi@osfi-bsif.gc.ca

**Documentation:**

The following documents are available for review and download:

*   [20221312_RFP_E_AMD003.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/04/27/c4562c1032de142d16b4ea7ed94b91e5/20221312_rfp_e_amd003.pdf)
*   [20221312_Request_For_Proposal_E.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/23/f23847ec475734ecf2827987bd4fb1dc/20221312_request_for_proposal_e.pdf)
*   [20221312_RFP_E_AMD002.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/04/18/408aee4bf99eef3da7857212aa1ab537/20221312_rfp_e_amd002.pdf)
*   [20221312_RFP_FR_AMD001.pdf](https://
